question: Who among the following players is considered the greatest Hockey players in the history of Hockey and was also offered a senior position in the German Army by Adolf Hitler?
explanation: Dhyan Chand was an Indian Hockey player and is considered as one of the greatest Hockey player in the history of the sport. He helped India win three Olympic Golds (1928, 1932 and 1936). Swimming Which is the International governing body of Swimming in the world?
